ARABIC: إِنَّنِىٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعْبُدْنِى وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكْرِىٓ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I am Allah. There is no god but Me, so worship Me and establish salat to remember Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I am God, and there is no god but I, so serve Me, and observe acts of prayer to remember Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily I am Allah. There is no god beside Me. So serve Me and establish Prayers to remember Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I Am the only God. Worship Me and be steadfast in prayer to have My name always in your mind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Indeed it is Me, Allah – there is no God except I – therefore worship Me and keep the prayer established for My remembrance.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, I am Allah! There is no God but Me, so worship Me, and perform Salah for My remembrance."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely I am Allah, there is no god but I, therefore serve Me and keep up prayer for My remembrance:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Verily I am God; there is no god but I; therefore serve Me, and perform the prayer of My remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! I, even I, am Allah, There is no Allah save Me. So serve Me and establish worship for My remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I am God. There is no deity save Me; so worship Me alone, and say your prayers in My remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily I! I am Allah! no God there is butI; so Worship Me, and establish prayer for My remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed I am Allah—there is no god except Me. So worship Me, and maintain the prayer for My remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily, I am Allah: There is no god but I: So serve thou Me (only), and establish regular prayer for celebrating My praise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! I am Allah! La ilaha illa Ana (none has the right to be worshipped but I), so worship Me, and perform As-Salat (Iqamat-as-Salat) for My Remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no god except Me. Worship Me, and establish the prayer of My remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I—I am God. There is no God but I. So serve Me, and practice the prayer for My remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:14] Verily I am God — there is no god except Me. So worship Me and establish prayer for to make remembrance of Me, in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! I, even I, am Allah. There is no God save Me. serve Me) obey Me (and establish worship for My remembrance) when you forget to perform a prayer, perform it when you do remember.
